State Regulations
§ 158.1 - Permanent books of account or records and contents of New York State income tax returns and other forms

§ 158.3 - Form of records
§ 158.4 - Records of employers and other persons required to file New York State information returns
§ 158.5 - Notice by Tax Commission requiring New York State income tax returns, statements, or the keeping of records
§ 158.6 - Copies of New York State income tax returns, schedules and statements

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
